verses.verse: <S%G3767>Therefore<s%> I <S%G3870>urge<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G3628>mercies<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> to <S%G3936>present<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4983>bodies<s%> <S%G2378>a<s%> <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifice,<s%> <S%G40>holy,<s%> <S%G2101>acceptable<s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%> which is <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3050>spiritual<s%> <S%G2999>service.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3361>Don't<s%> <S%G4964>be<s%> <S%G4964>conformed<s%> <S%G165>to<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G165>world,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> be <S%G3339>transformed<s%> by the <S%G342>renewing<s%> <S%G3563>of<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3563>mind,<s%> so <S%G1519>that<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> may <S%G1381>prove<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> is <S%G2307>the<s%> <S%G18>good,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2101>well-pleasing,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5046>perfect<s%> <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> I <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> that was <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G3427>me,<s%> to every <S%G3956>man<s%> who <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> to <S%G5252>think<s%> of himself more <S%G5252>highly<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> he <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G5426>think;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> to <S%G5426>think<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G4993>reasonably,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G3307>apportioned<s%> to each <S%G1538>person<s%> a <S%G3358>measure<s%> of <S%G4102>faith.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> even <S%G2509>as<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3196>members<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4983>body,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3196>members<s%> <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4234>the<s%> <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G4234>function,<s%>

<S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2070>we,<s%> who are <S%G4183>many,<s%> <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G2596><s%> <S%G1520>individually<s%> <S%G3196>members<s%> one of <S%G240>another.<s%>

<S%G2192>Having<s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5486>gifts<s%> <S%G1313>differing<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> that was <S%G1325>given<s%> to <S%G2254>us,<s%> if <S%G4394>prophecy,<s%> let <S%G2254>us<s%> prophesy according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G356>proportion<s%> of our <S%G4102>faith;<s%>
<S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G1248>service,<s%> let us give ourselves <S%G1722>to<s%> <S%G1248>service;<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> he who <S%G1321>teaches,<s%> <S%G1722>to<s%> his <S%G1319>teaching;<s%>

<S%G1535>or<s%> he who <S%G3870>exhorts,<s%> <S%G1722>to<s%> his <S%G3874>exhorting:<s%> he who <S%G3330>gives,<s%> let him do it <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G572>liberality;<s%> he who <S%G4291>rules,<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G4710>diligence;<s%> he who shows <S%G1653>mercy,<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G2432>cheerfulness.<s%>
Let <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G5600>be<s%> without <S%G505>hypocrisy.<s%> <S%G655>Abhor<s%> that which is <S%G4190>evil.<s%> <S%G2853>Cling<s%> to that which is <S%G18>good.<s%>
In <S%G5360>love<s%> of the brothers be tenderly <S%G5387>affectionate<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G240>another;<s%> in <S%G5092>honor<s%> <S%G4285>preferring<s%> one <S%G240>another;<s%>
<S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3636>lagging<s%> in <S%G4710>diligence;<s%> <S%G2204>fervent<s%> in <S%G4151>spirit;<s%> <S%G1398>serving<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%>
<S%G5463>rejoicing<s%> in <S%G1680>hope;<s%> <S%G5278>enduring<s%> in <S%G2347>troubles;<s%> continuing <S%G4342>steadfastly<s%> in <S%G4335>prayer;<s%>
contributing <S%G1377>to<s%> the <S%G5532>needs<s%> of the <S%G40>saints;<s%> given <S%G1377>to<s%> <S%G5381>hospitality.<s%>
<S%G2127>Bless<s%> those who <S%G1377>persecute<s%> <S%G5209>you;<s%> <S%G2127>bless,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3361>don't<s%> <S%G2672>curse.<s%>
<S%G5463>Rejoice<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> those who <S%G5463>rejoice.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2799>Weep<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> those who <S%G2799>weep.<s%>

Be <S%G5426>of<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G5426>mind<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G240>another.<s%> <S%G3361>Don't<s%> set your <S%G5426>mind<s%> on high <S%G5308>things,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G4879>associate<s%> with the <S%G5011>humble.<s%> <S%G3361>Don't<s%> <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G5429>wise<s%> <S%G3844>in<s%> your own <S%G1438>conceits.<s%>

<S%G591>Repay<s%> no <S%G3367>one<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G473>for<s%> <S%G2556>evil.<s%> <S%G4306>Respect<s%> what is <S%G2570>honorable<s%> in the sight <S%G1799>of<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men.<s%>
<S%G1487>If<s%> it is <S%G1415>possible,<s%> as much as it is <S%G1537>up<s%> to <S%G5216>you,<s%> be at <S%G1514>peace<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men.<s%>

<S%G3361>Don't<s%> seek <S%G1556>revenge<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves,<s%> <S%G27>beloved,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> to <S%G3709>God<s%>'s wrath. <S%G1063>For<s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G1557>"Vengeance<s%> belongs to <S%G1698>me;<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> will <S%G467>repay,<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>"

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G1437>"If<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2190>enemy<s%> is <S%G3983>hungry,<s%> <S%G5595>feed<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%> <S%G1437>If<s%> he is <S%G1372>thirsty,<s%> <S%G4222>give<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> a <S%G4222>drink;<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> in <S%G4160>doing<s%> <S%G5124>so,<s%> you will <S%G4987>heap<s%> <S%G440>coals<s%> of <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2776>head.<s%>"
<S%G3361>Don't<s%> <S%G3528>be<s%> <S%G3528>overcome<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G2556>evil,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3528>overcome<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G18>good.<s%>
